p: The extract of wild bilberry leaves was prepared using the method of maceration. Namely, 50 g of the grounded herbal drug was mixed with 300 mL of 70% ethanol and the extraction was carried out at room temperature with occasional stirring. After 72 h, the extract was filtered through filter paper and the precipitate was re-extracted with 20 mL of the fresh solvent. After 48 h, the process was repeated and the combined supernatants were evaporated to dryness. The extraction yield was 16.1%.
